evidence: Clear separation of concerns with distinct modules for database (models), business logic (main), and data transfer (schemas)
Single package structure with well-defined layers: app/ contains submodules for different responsibilities
Database abstraction through SQLAlchemy models and session management
API layer (FastAPI) separated from domain models and schemas
Low fan-out (2.5) suggests good layer isolation
Directory depth of 2 indicates flat but organized structure typical of layered architecture
risks: Tight coupling between FastAPI routes and business logic in main.py
Database models directly imported in load.py script suggesting some bypassing of layers
Limited number of files (6) may not fully represent complex layer interactions
